General.Name: Guangdong Land Holdings Limited
General.Description: Guangdong Land Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, develops and invests in properties primarily in Mainland China. The company was formerly known as Kingway Brewery Holdings Limited and changed its name to Guangdong Land Holdings Limited in September 2013. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Guangdong Land Holdings Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangdong Investment Limited.
General.Address: Guangdong Investment Tower, Central, Hong Kong

6.Name: Ms. Lai Hung  Mak ACS, ACIS
